creator: Augury
descriptionHtml:
The Halo solutions provide custom diagnostics and insights for your most unique assets. From pumps, fans, chillers, air compressors to advanced process machinery – Halo can transition your current strategies to a true predictive maintenance model.
Use the Halo Installation app to connect Halo IoT devices, mounted on your equipment, to the Augury secured cloud. In addition, the app allows you to follow the progress of live installations and verify device connectivity and data transmission.

Note: In order to use the Halo Installation app you will need Augury’s login credentials and hardware.
descriptionShort: Install Augury's sensors on your equipment using this app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We've packed this new release with useful new visual experiences as well as a set of new languages for the entire app.
What's in the new release you ask?
☆ Machine photos tags - we've added. tags to each image of a machine, for a better overall experience.
☆ Translations - We have added 5 languages in the app: French, German, Polish, Italian and Spanish.
☆ Zoom - We've enabled pinch-to-zoom standard functionality on top of machine images..

title: Halo Installation

creator: Augury
descriptionHtml:
The Halo solutions provide custom diagnostics and insights for your most unique assets. From pumps, fans, chillers, air compressors to advanced process machinery – Halo can transition your current strategies to a true predictive maintenance model.
Use the Halo Installation app to connect Halo IoT devices, mounted on your equipment, to the Augury secured cloud. In addition, the app allows you to follow the progress of live installations and verify device connectivity and data transmission.

Note: In order to use the Halo Installation app you will need Augury’s login credentials and hardware.
descriptionShort: Install Augury's sensors on your equipment using this app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* The list of machines / nodes (per building) on a job will be sorted alphabetically to ease navigation.
* Improvements to the app performance in upload / download of photos occurring in the background, thus allowing faster responsiveness and job completion.
